short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your recruiting experience with HireSweet. Schedule reminders & optimize your productivity.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Double your recruitment efficiency with the HireSweet CRM extension

▻  Create new contacts easily from the extension
▻  Send e-mails directly from your favorite social media
▻  Engage new contacts with advanced personalization
▻  See the past activity from HireSweet and your ATS, and collaborate

──────────────────────────────
⚠ You need a HireSweet account to use that extension. Ask for more information on https://hiresweet.com.
